meanings.definition: Ocotillos: a type of desert plant with long, spiny branches.
meanings.sent1: The ocotillos in the desert have sharp thorns for protection.
meanings.sent2: We admired the beautiful ocotillos while hiking in the arid landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous desert critters used the ocotillos as hiding spots during their game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The ocotillos stood tall like guardians of the dry land, their branches reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red flowers blooming on the ocotillos added a splash of color to the barren desert.
